attributes.action: allow the the hard shoulder only to facilitate the exit and entry onto the motorways of britian, and enforce safer practices of driving onto and off these junctions as many accidents are caused by cutting in at last moment to exit or barging onto the motorway causing following drivers to brake sharply causing accident by rear shuntings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To allow the use of the hard shoulder one mile distance either way to ease/eradicate congestion and accidents around these junctions and to enforce by camera the safe driving around these junctions from persons who cut in at last moment due to being inpatient and barging out into flow of traffic.
The cameras are already there let us use them to curb deaths and accidents on our roads.
